column5: Hi Folks, I need to get a 18Lb Richter anchor for my baot,could someone please tell me where I could buy it in Canada.thank you
Not sure what you would have to pay for shipping but you could order them right from Rickter or Cabelas. I have one and they work great!
Thanks for your reply, that seems to be my only option,I was hoping to find one here,
Did you try the BassPro Store in Vaughn Mills Ontario near Toronto ?
Did you try the BassPro Store in Vaughn Mills Ontario near Toronto ?
>Did you try the BassPro Store in Vaughn Mills Ontario near >Toronto ? That was the ist place I tried,BPS don't carry them. Cabela's does but we don't have them here.....yet.
